columns.label: No. of Beneficiary Have Bank Account

name: Beneficiaries have Bank
query:
SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN existing_bank_account = 'No' THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Yes'
    END AS has_bank_account,
    COUNT(name) AS beneficiary_count
FROM tabBeneficiary
GROUP BY
    CASE
        WHEN existing_bank_account = 'No' THEN 'No'
        ELSE 'Yes'
    END;
